chart_description: This chart displays the time taken for training in the machine learning process. It shows the time allotted for training, the time consumed and the remaining time for training.

dimension_descriptions.allotted: This dimension shows the time allotted for training in milliseconds.
dimension_descriptions.consumed: This dimension shows the time taken for training in milliseconds.
dimension_descriptions.remaining: This dimension shows the time remaining for training in milliseconds.
